alert.note: Alert for Huron; Seneca (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued August 24 at 11:12PM EDT until August 24 at 11:45PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1145 PM EDT FOR WESTERN HURON...SENECA...ERIE AND SANDUSKY COUNTIES... At 1112 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 7 miles northeast of Put-In-Bay to near Gibsonburg, moving southeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Sandusky, Tiffin, Norwalk, Fremont, Western Vermilion, Bellevue, Clyde, Willard, Gibsonburg, Green Springs, Northern Milan, Milan, Wakeman, Bloomville, Castalia, Ballville, Monroeville, Marblehead, Attica and Berlin Heights. TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
